description:
Combining all their powers, Chad, Noba and Rangiku put together a plan to stop Sawatari and Baura.  Will they defeat this elderly bount or will they turn into fish food?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Byakuya Assembles! The Gotei 13 Make Their Move
Byakuya Shoushuu! Ugokidasu Gotei Juusan Tai
白哉召集! 動き出す護廷十三隊
